'eXtra' is an Australian advertorial datacasting channel launched on 26 March
2012. The channel broadcasts mainly infomercials as well as home shopping,
religion, community, educational, adult services, multi-cultural programming as
well as stories taken from A Current Affair, Getaway, Mornings and Today.
categories: Television channels and stations established in 2012
